name: How I Snow
description:
Take control of a snowball and navigate through many fast paced challenges to become a snowman. Can you earn 5 snowflakes in all levels?

Roll A Snow was created by Daniel HCC and Matheus Mangia for the Great Winter Jam 2020.

Music:
- Ice Village - Karate Studios
- Black Diamond - Joth

Asset packs:
- Skybox Extended Shader - BOXOPHOBIC
- Flat Kit: Toon Shading and Water - Dustyroom
